text.*:
Be My Servant

Chapter Info

Volume:

87

Chapter:

874

Japanese Title:

私のしもべになりなさい

Romanized Title:

Watashi no Shimobe ni Narinasai

Viz Title:

Be My Servant

Pages:

19

Release Date:

August 7, 2017

WSJ Issue:

2017 Issue 36-37

Anime:

Episode 844 (p. 3-5)
Episode 845 (p. 5-19)
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →
Chapter 874 is titled "Be My Servant".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Color Spread: Luffy along with the top 11 characters outside of the Straw Hats of the sixth popularity poll are riding the Azure Dragon, a blue-green dragon from East Asian folklore, while Doflamingo and Crocodile float near by using their Devil Fruits abilities.

The results of the sixth character popularity poll are announced.

Short Summary[]

As Big Mom unleashes devastating attacks, the Sanji Retrieval Team urges Kingbaum to keep going as they head into the Seducing Woods. Nami manages to win Zeus to her side by feeding it thunderclouds, but Prometheus sets Kingbaum ablaze and the Big Mom Pirates lie in wait to ambush their enemies from every possible location. Meanwhile, Pudding catches up to Bege elsewhere and asks Chiffon for help, saying that she wants to stop Big Mom to save Sanji and his friends.

Long Summary[]

As the Sanji Retrieval Team approaches the Seducing Woods, Big Mom and Zeus catch up with them. She draws Napoleon out and slices a large chunk off of Kingbaum. As Kingbaum pleads for his life, Nami asks him about Lady Tree, who is revealed to be his fiance. Baum resolves not to die here and pushes forward. Big Mom prepares for another attack; Luffy decides to fight Big Mom but Nami gets an idea. She uses her Clima-Tact to produce thunderclouds, which distracts Zeus. Attracted to the clouds, it begins to eat them, displacing Big Mom and causing her to miss her attack. Both Prometheus and Napoleon wonder what Zeus is doing and exclaim in disbelief that the Straw Hats are almost at the Seducing Woods. The homies make way for Kingbaum and Luffy notices the Thousand Sunny in the distance.

Zeus approaches them and asks Nami if she has any more thunderclouds he can eat, saying it has never had anything so delicious before. Luffy asks to ride it, but Zeus says that only Big Mom can due to giving him part of her soul. Nami says that if Zeus becomes her servant, she'll make him as many thunderclouds as he wants. Zeus is torn between betraying Big Mom and getting more clouds. Big Mom emits a scream, demanding that the Seducing Woods homies stop Kingbaum. The homies close the path they made but, determined to see Lady Tree again, Kingbaum begins to push through his subordinates. Prometheus hovers over Kingbaum and slams down on top of him, setting Baum and much of the Seducing Woods on fire.

Back at the ruins of the Whole Cake Chateau, Perospero and Daifuku are organizing ingredients to make the cake for Big Mom. Brûlée is in communication with Mont-d'Or, proclaiming that there's 10,000 soldiers ready to be deployed to catch Capone Bege and the retreating Fire Tank Pirates. Mont-d'Or orders the tart ships and all other ships in the area to target the south west coast, where the Thousand Sunny is docked. At the same time, Katakuri is in place aboard the Sunny with the crocodile minister and some soldiers lying in wait for the Sanji Retrieval Team.

While Bege is fleeing, Pudding catches up to him and asks to speak with her sister Chiffon. Chiffon surmises that Big Mom is having an eating fit and Pudding is looking for her help, but refuses to come back. Pudding says that Big Mom will kill Sanji and the Straw Hats and is asking Chiffon for her help to stop their mother.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • This chapter was titled "Kingbaum" (キングバーム, Kingu Bāmu?) in its original Shonen Jump release, but was changed to "Become My Servant" when it was released in Volume 87.
  • Lady Tree is revealed to be Kingbaum's fiancée.
  • Kingbaum officially betrays Big Mom for the sake of returning to Lady Tree alive.
  • Prometheus attacks and burns Kingbaum.
  • The Sanji Retrieval Team manages to elude Big Mom and Nami tells Zeus to become her servant in exchange for more black balls.
  • The Big Mom Pirates are all around the island and the seas are being watched.
    • Charlotte Brûlée, Perospero, Daifuku, and 10,000 soldiers are in the Mirro-World waiting to attack.
    • Tartes from several islands like Candy Island, Biscuits Island, and Nuts Island are blocking the Sanji Retrieval Team's sea route.
    • Two new Totto Land islands are mentioned: Flavor Island and Liqueur Island.
    • Charlotte Katakuri and several soldiers are waiting for the Straw Hats onboard the Thousand Sunny.
    • The Fire Tank Pirates are pursued by tart tanks.
  • Charlotte Pudding catches up with Capone Bege and asks for Chiffon's help to stop their mother, saying that she wants to save Sanji and his friends.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


One Piece Magazine volume 2 is now out. It's a limited edition, so please buy it while you still can.


ONE PIECEマガジン2冊目が出ました。記念本で、後では買えませんのでぜひ。

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by VIZ Media. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

'''Chapter 874''' is titled "Be My Servant".

==Cover Page==
[[Cover Page#Color Spread|Color Spread]]: [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] along with the top 11 characters outside of the [[Straw Hat Pirates|Straw Hats]] of the [[Popularity Polls|sixth popularity poll]] are riding the [[wikipedia:Azure Dragon|Azure Dragon]], a blue-green dragon from East Asian folklore, while [[Donquixote Doflamingo|Doflamingo]] and [[Crocodile]] float near by using their [[Devil Fruit]]s [[Ito Ito no Mi|abil]][[Suna Suna no Mi|ities]].

The results of the sixth [[Popularity Polls|character popularity poll]] are announced.

==Short Summary==
As [[Charlotte Linlin|Big Mom]] unleashes devastating attacks, the [[Sanji]] Retrieval Team urges [[Kingbaum]] to keep going as they head into the Seducing Woods. [[Nami]] manages to win [[Zeus]] to her side by feeding it thunderclouds, but [[Prometheus]] sets Kingbaum ablaze and the [[Big Mom Pirates]] lie in wait to ambush their enemies from every possible location. Meanwhile, [[Pudding]] catches up to [[Bege]] elsewhere and asks [[Chiffon]] for help, saying that she wants to stop Big Mom to save Sanji and his friends.

==Long Summary==
As the Sanji Retrieval Team approaches the Seducing Woods, [[Charlotte Linlin|Big Mom]] and [[Zeus]] catch up with them. She draws [[Napoleon]] out and slices a large chunk off of [[Kingbaum]]. As Kingbaum pleads for his life, [[Nami]] asks him about [[Lady Tree]], who is revealed to be his fiance. Baum resolves not to die here and pushes forward. Big Mom prepares for another attack; [[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] decides to fight Big Mom but Nami gets an idea. She uses her Clima-Tact to produce thunderclouds, which distracts Zeus. Attracted to the clouds, it begins to eat them, displacing Big Mom and causing her to miss her attack. Both [[Prometheus]] and Napoleon wonder what Zeus is doing and exclaim in disbelief that the Straw Hats are almost at the Seducing Woods. The [[homies]] make way for Kingbaum and Luffy notices the [[Thousand Sunny]] in the distance.

Zeus approaches them and asks Nami if she has any more thunderclouds he can eat, saying it has never had anything so delicious before. Luffy asks to ride it, but Zeus says that only Big Mom can due to giving him part of her soul. Nami says that if Zeus becomes her servant, she'll make him as many thunderclouds as he wants. Zeus is torn between betraying Big Mom and getting more clouds. Big Mom emits a scream, demanding that the Seducing Woods homies stop Kingbaum. The homies close the path they made but, determined to see Lady Tree again, Kingbaum begins to push through his subordinates. Prometheus hovers over Kingbaum and slams down on top of him, setting Baum and much of the Seducing Woods on fire.

Back at the ruins of the Whole Cake Chateau, [[Charlotte Perospero|Perospero]] and [[Daifuku]] are organizing ingredients to make the cake for Big Mom. [[Brûlée]] is in communication with [[Mont-d'Or]], proclaiming that there's 10,000 soldiers ready to be deployed to catch [[Capone Bege]] and the retreating [[Fire Tank Pirates]]. Mont-d'Or orders the tart ships and all other ships in the area to target the south west coast, where the Thousand Sunny is docked. At the same time, [[Katakuri]] is in place aboard the Sunny with the crocodile minister and some soldiers lying in wait for the Sanji Retrieval Team.

While Bege is fleeing, [[Pudding]] catches up to him and asks to speak with her sister [[Chiffon]]. Chiffon surmises that Big Mom is having an eating fit and Pudding is looking for her help, but refuses to come back. Pudding says that Big Mom will kill [[Sanji]] and the Straw Hats and is asking Chiffon for her help to stop their mother.

==Quick References==
===Chapter Notes===
*This chapter was titled {{Nihongo|"'''Kingbaum'''"|キングバーム|Kingu Bāmu}} in its original Shonen Jump release, but was changed to "Become My Servant" when it was released in Volume 87.
*[[Lady Tree]] is revealed to be [[Kingbaum]]'s fiancée.
*Kingbaum officially betrays [[Charlotte Linlin|Big Mom]] for the sake of returning to Lady Tree alive.
*[[Prometheus]] attacks and burns Kingbaum.
*The [[Straw Hat Pirates#Members|Sanji Retrieval Team]] manages to elude Big Mom and [[Nami]] tells [[Zeus]] to become her servant in exchange for more [[Art of Weather/Fourth Clima-Tact|black balls]].
*The [[Big Mom Pirates]] are all around the island and the seas are being watched.
**[[Charlotte Brûlée]], [[Charlotte Perospero|Perospero]], [[Charlotte Daifuku|Daifuku]], and 10,000 soldiers are in the [[Mirro-World]] waiting to attack.
**[[Totto Land#Tartes|Tartes]] from several islands like [[Candy Island]], [[Biscuits Island]], and [[Nuts Island]] are blocking the Sanji Retrieval Team's sea route.
**Two new Totto Land islands are mentioned: [[Flavor Island]] and [[Liqueur Island]].
**[[Charlotte Katakuri]] and several [[Totto Land#Chess Soldiers|soldiers]] are waiting for the Straw Hats onboard the [[Thousand Sunny]].
**The [[Fire Tank Pirates]] are pursued by tart tanks.
*[[Charlotte Pudding]] catches up with [[Capone Bege]] and asks for [[Charlotte Chiffon|Chiffon]]'s help to stop their mother, saying that she wants to save [[Sanji]] and his friends.
